entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries late this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
